title: My Saturday Morning Ritual
excerpt: When I was a wee lil lad I would sit in front of the television box every Saturday morning with a huge bowl of cereal as I enjoyed endless cartoon entertainment.

data.text: When I was a wee lil lad I would sit in front of the television box every Saturday morning with a huge bowl of cereal as I enjoyed endless cartoon entertainment.
It was a relaxing time and ever so enjoyable. The options of 2d action packed goodness sent colorful electrons from the tv screen, through my retinas, and straight into my occipital lobe.
What was a kid to do with all this excitement? Well... There was only one thing you could do, which was to binge in front of the TV for hours on end!

Although during times of battle-scenes you might find me jumping from couch to couch re-enacting some of the awesome fighting moves. What would you expect? After shoveling down 2 bowls of high-octane sugar powered cereal I was running on all cylindars!
It was a thrilling time to be alive
May those memories forever rest in peace.

meta.title: My Saturday Morning Ritual
meta.description: When I was a wee lil lad I would sit in front of the television box every Saturday morning with a huge bowl of cereal as I enjoyed endless cartoon entertainment.
